name: Generic RPG Idle
description:
Turn-based combat stripped to the core. Get loot, optimize your equipment, defeat mighty foes, enjoy the story.

Features

  • The 3 cores of an RPG without the annoyances
Defeat foes, get better loot, read the cutscenes. No exploration, no quests, no walking around trying to figure out what to do.
  • Deadly combat awaits
  • There is always better loot
  • A plot for the readers, that does not punish the skippers
